message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking to get it for $120, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $125, but I'm still not sure I can go as low as $115. Can we meet in the middle at $125?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $120, which is the minimum I'm willing to go. Can we make a deal at this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108.
